text: Minoo Mohraz (, born 19 January 1946) is an Iranian physician, researcher and AIDS specialist. She is a Professor of Infectious Diseases at the Tehran University of Medical Sciences and head of the Iranian Centre for HIV/AIDS. Mohraz was thought to be Iran's foremost medical expert on HIV/AIDS. Mohraz was born in Tehran. During the 2019â€“20 coronavirus outbreak, she was appointed a member of committee to combat Coronavirus. On 14 March, Iranian media reported that she had been infected with COVID-19. ==References== Category:Medical researchers Category:1946 births Category:Iranian physicians Category:People from Tehran Category:Living people
title: Minoo Mohraz
